com.example.app.service

Class PersonService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.app.service.PersonService

  • public class PersonService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as abstraction between the HttpHandlers and the PersonRepository DAO. Simplifies the interaction and avoids for web handlers to interact with database directly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PersonService(android.content.Context context)
      Main constructor for this class.

      Will create a new Person in the SQLite database through the PersonRepository.insert(Person) method.
      void cleanUp()
      Closes and releases the PersonRepository instance.

      Will delete an existing Person in the SQLite database using it's id.

      Will fetch an existing Person in the SQLite database using it's id.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PersonService

        public PersonService(android.content.Context context)
        Main constructor for this class. Receives an instance of the Application's Context to be able to instantiate the PersonRepository.
        Parameters:
        context - the Application's Context instance.

    • Method Detail

      • addNewPerson

        public long addNewPerson(java.lang.String firstName,
                         java.lang.String lastName)
        Will create a new Person in the SQLite database through the PersonRepository.insert(Person) method.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the String value representing a Person's first name.
        lastName - the String value representing a Person's last name.
        Returns:
        long value corresponding to the new Person's ID on the database

      • updatePerson

        public boolean updatePerson(int id,
                            java.lang.String firstName,
                            java.lang.String lastName)
        Will update an existing Person in the SQLite database using it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - the int Id of the Person to be updated
        firstName - the new String value of the Person's first name.
        lastName - the new String value of the Person's last name.
        Returns:
        boolean true if Person record was updated successfully, false otherwise.

      • deletePerson

        public boolean deletePerson(int id)
        Will delete an existing Person in the SQLite database using it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - the int Id of the Person to be deleted.
        Returns:
        boolean true if Person record was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

      • findAllPeople

        public java.util.List<Person> findAllPeople()
        Will retrieve all Person records from the SQLite database.
        Returns:
        the List list with all the records.

      • findPersonById

        public Person findPersonById(int id)
        Will fetch an existing Person in the SQLite database using it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - the int ID of the person to be fetched.
        Returns:
        the Person instance representing the record if found, null otherwise

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Closes and releases the PersonRepository instance.
